text: Ana tujile uli achalongo achinjangu? Pankuchingangana pamo kwapopelela Akunnungu, jwine ajimbe lujimbo ni jwine ajiganyisye, ni jwine akole uunukuko waukutyochela kwa Akunnungu ni jwine aŵechete kwa chiŵecheto changamanyika ni jwine ŵagopolele ŵandu chachiŵechetekwe cho. Indu yose itendekwe kwa kwagumba ŵandu ŵakunkulupilila Che Yesu.
